column4: I have an ubuntu server and want to install VirtualBox non-free edition. I want to update my sources.list to automatically get updated version of VirtualBox. The apt-get lines are available here: http://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Linux_Downloads#Debian-basedLinuxdistributions
My question: should I edit /etc/sources.list manually with a text editor? Or is there a better way to modify the /etc/sources.list?
